sentences.sentence: The Russian delegation in talks with the UN has announced the Kremlin is ready to accept a 60-day extension of the Black Sea grain initiative. The deal, initially brokered by Turkey and the UN last July, allowed ships to export Ukrainian foodstuffs and fertilizer from three ports along the Black Sea. However, Ukrainian officials are insisting that the agreement involves at least 120 days of extension and is waiting for the official position of Turkey and the UN. Furthermore, Ankara's defense ministry said on Tuesday that talks over the extension of the Green Deal are still ongoing.

sentences.sentence: Amnesty International published a new report on Tuesday in which it denounced the increasingly

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: widespread use of riot weapons such as rubber and plastic bullets, by police around the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Amnesty has joined up with 30 other organizations to call for the signing of an international treaty against the use of what it calls instruments of torture.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In the report, Amnesty International's Patrick Wilkins said the manufacture and trade of weapons, known as kinetic impact projectiles, rubber and plastic bullets, Amnesty International's Patrick Wilkins said the manufacture and trade of weapons, known as kinetic impact projectiles, rubber and plastic bullets, need to be controlled to combat what he called an escalating cycle of abuse.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The report is the result of five years of research in tens of countries and reveals that thousands of protesters and bystanders have been injured and dozens killed as a result of the use of these weapons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In France, for example, nearly 2,500 protesters were injured at the height of the Yellow Vest protests.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: 440 eye injuries have been recorded in Chile since protests against inequality began in 2019.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But Amnesty International says the real numbers are probably much higher.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Cyclone Freddy has killed more than 100 people and injured dozens in Malawi and Mozambique after slamming into southern Africa for the second time in a month.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Freddy is one of the strongest cyclones ever recorded in the southern hemisphere and could be the longest lasting tropical one. It first developed near Australia and has traveled the entire Indian Ocean.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Freddie's destructive winds and heavy rains have demolished roads and houses, sweeping them away with their occupants inside.
